mapper.select: /* getVersionCheckCount */ SELECT current_version_code, current_version_name, is_forced_update, date_format(UPDATE_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') UPDATE_DTTM FROM app_version WHERE os_type = #{osType} AND version_key = (SELECT MAX(version_key) FROM app_version WHERE os_type = #{osType})

/* getVersionCheckCountByVersionCode */ SELECT count(*) FROM app_version WHERE is_forced_update = 1 AND current_version_code > #{currentVersionCodeParam} AND current_version_code <= #{currentVersionCodeDB}
